patch.description: Update an instance of 'Relationships' with the given payload of type 'Relationship' in JSON format and with the specified id.

get.description: Retrieve all or some selected properties from an instance of 'Relationships' with the given id.

delete.description: Delete an instance of 'Relationships' with the specified id.

post.description: Create an instance of 'Relationships' with the given payload of type 'Relationship' in JSON format.

get.description: Retrieve a collection of 'Relationships' with all or some selected properties in the given order by specifying the given filter condition.

info.description: This is a sample server Petstore server.
info.title: Swagger For Service Layer

tags.name: Relationships
tags.description: This entity enables you to manipulate 'Relationships'. It represents the relationships list from which a relationship definition can be associated with a partner in a sales opportunity.
